'''''Angles and Britons: O'Donnell Lectures''''' is a collection of papers delivered in the annual series of O'Donnell Lectures. The volume includes [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s 1955 lecture "[[English and Welsh]]" (pp. [1]-41).<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref><ref>[[Åke Bertenstam]], ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tbchron.html A Chronological Bibliography of the Writings of J.R.R. Tolkien]'', as of 17 August 2010</ref>
